Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The Shangri-La Hotel, Beijing places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Capital Indoor Stadium and Beijing Aquarium. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Five Pagoda Temple and Beijing Zoo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 670 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle and a train station pick-up service are provided for an additional charge.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Capital Indoor Stadium - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Five Pagoda Temple - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Beijing Zoo - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
China Central Television Tower - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Beijing Aquarium - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Yuyuantan Park - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Big Bell Temple - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Museum of the Chinese Revolution - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Zhongguancun Electronics City - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Capital Museum - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Temple of the White Dagoba - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Peking University - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Baiyun Guan - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Guangji Temple - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi

The preferred airport for The Shangri-La Hotel, Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 28.7 km / 17.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for The Shangri-La Hotel, Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 29 km / 18 mi.
